hiveArticle.title: [Architecture] Golden Temple in Coorg, India
hiveArticle.body:
# <center> Namaste, Have a great day everyone</center>

### <center> Golden Temple is situated around 35 Kms from the Madikeri Town, Karnataka, India. Both the outside as well as inside of the building is quite beautiful. There were many temples inside the campus. This place is very well maintained and you will see a lot of monks out there.</center>

<hr>

# <center> Awesome looking temple from Far</center>

<hr>

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVVLXNsFThdnCJ4fbKwGefBPk95dP1LA3K8LeAd9cyHJ1/image.png)

<hr>

<hr>
